name: Grilled Cheese De Mayo
author: SHORECOOK
summary: This is a nice change from your usual grilled cheese. It's made with mayo on the outside in place of butter and pepperjack cheese. It's a grilled cheese with a kick. Feel free to use your favorite cheese combination. To make it kid friendly leave out the pepperjack cheese.
directions: Spread 1/2 the mayonnaise onto one side of a slice of bread and place, mayonnaise-side down, in a skillet
Place American cheese and pepperjack cheese on top of the bread
Spread remaining mayonnaise onto one side of the remaining bread and place, mayonnaise-side up, on top of the cheese
Cook sandwich in the skillet over medium heat until cheese melts and the bread is golden brown, about 2 1/2 minutes per side
